title: 23 Funny Feline Memes For Pawrents Presenting Their Cats as Grandchildren to Their Parents
description: Is it a Millennial thing to call your cats "children"? Because we sort of feel it is. Cats are not just cats, they're our children. We educate them, we feed them, we clean their "business", we play with them, and they sleep in our house. They mostly sleep. So maybe instead of "children" we should call them our "teenagers". Yes, that sounds more accurate.So, gather around cat pawrents, and bring your cat children and cat teenagers with you. We want to present to you something you both can enjoy together - a whole bunch of cat memes. Cat memes aren't here only for us, humble hoomans, they're here for cats as well. So gather your cat children and let's dive in.We gathered some seriously funny feline memes for you and your fluffy feline friends. They're meant to be enjoyed by both intelligent apes like us, and fluffy felines like your meowjestic cats. Take it all in, the floofiness and the laughter, and the sheer hilarity that is cat memes.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 23 Funny Feline Memes For Pawrents Presenting Their Cats as Grandchildren to Their Parents - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Is it a Millennial thing to call your cats "children"? Because we sort of feel it is. Cats are not just cats, they're our children. We educate them, we feed them, we clean their "business", we play with them, and they sleep in our house. They mostly sleep. So maybe instead of "children" we should call them our "teenagers". Yes, that sounds more accurate.

So, gather around cat pawrents, and bring your cat children and cat teenagers with you. We want to present to you something you both can enjoy together - a whole bunch of cat memes. Cat memes aren't here only for us, humble hoomans, they're here for cats as well. So gather your cat children and let's dive in.

We gathered some seriously funny feline memes for you and your fluffy feline friends. They're meant to be enjoyed by both intelligent apes like us, and fluffy felines like your meowjestic cats. Take it all in, the floofiness and the laughter, and the sheer hilarity that is cat memes.
